        public void speak()

      • applyDamage

        public int applyDamage​(Character target)
        Description copied from class: Character
        Method to calculate the amount of damage applied. Dmg = Base dmg + weapon dmg If weapon lose durability, Dmg = Base dmg Normal calculation like this is applied to bad guys.
        Overrides:
        applyDamage in class Character
        Parameters:
        target - of either hero or badguy
        Returns:
        quantity damage applied to the target based on the strength and the weapon's attack method.
